question:
The Global Diplomacy Index 2019 was recently published. In this context, consider the following statements:
  1. USA was listed at the top spot with maximum number of embassies and consulates worldwide.
  2. India showed the biggest drop in the number of diplomatic posts.
Which of the above statements is/are true?
explanation: Statement 1 is incorrect: The Global Diplomacy Index 2019 listed China as the country with the most number of embassies and consulates across the world. China had overtaken USA to the top spot and it has 276 such institutions across the world. USA came second with 273 embassies and consulates. Â Statement 2 is incorrect: The biggest drop in the number of diplomatic posts was recorded for Taiwan. While it had 22 embassies in 2016, it has just 15 embassies this year. India is ranked at the 12th spot with 123 high commissions and embassies and 54 consulates across the world. The index ranked 63 countries.
